scripts.data:unzip: mkdir -p data/corpus/tmp; for i in "data/corpusRaw/"*".mxl"; do unzip -nd data/corpus/tmp/ $i; mv -fv data/corpus/tmp/*.xml "$(echo $i | sed s/mxl$/xml/ | sed s/corpusRaw/corpus/)"; done; rm -rf data/corpus/tmp
scripts.data:seed:chorales: node scripts/createChoraleData.js > data/chorales.txt && echo "$(cat ./data/chorales.txt | wc -l) chorales written to disk"
scripts.data:seed:notes: node scripts/createNoteData.js > data/notes.txt && echo "$(cat ./data/notes.txt | wc -l) notes written to disk"
scripts.data: yarn data:clean && yarn data:dl && yarn data:unzip && yarn data:seed
scripts.seed: yarn migrate && yarn run sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.migrate: yarn run sequelize db:drop && yarn run sequelize db:create && yarn run sequelize db:migrate
